name: Fear & Fury (itch)
description:
What is Fear & Fury?

In Fear & Fury, play as Simon Shaw, a mechanic, cursed with lycanthropy. Relish in or fight against lycanthropy in the City of The Cursed. Search for a cure amongst vandals, the law and the afflicted by allying with them or clash with guns and maws. Fear & Fury is a challenging turn-based Tactics RPG in a unique modern dark fantasy world filled with crucial choices that influence the story and how you play.

Key Features
  • Relish in lycanthropy or reclaim humanity to decide your fate - use fear to spare or kill to the point of no return 
  • Meet 3 diverse factions bringing their own ideals and skills - The Crimson Vandals, Sentinels and The Cursed
  • Become stronger with a story driven character progression entwining further with humanity or lycanthropy
  • Confront faction characters which lead into alliances, battles and passes
  • Play in unique turn-based combat encounters in the disturbing streets of Crimson City
  • Experience a distinctive gritty art style
  • Map out, plan your road ahead and manage your part
